scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=test && export TEST=false && nodemon index.js
scripts.production: export NODE_ENV=production && export TEST=false && nodemon index.js
scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=dev && export TEST=false && nodemon index.js
scripts.loc: export NODE_ENV=loc && export TEST=false && nodemon index.js
scripts.test-win: set NODE_ENV=test && set TEST=false && nodemon index.js
scripts.production-win: set NODE_ENV=production && set TEST=false && nodemon index.js
scripts.dev-win: set NODE_ENV=dev && set TEST=false && nodemon recive.js
scripts.loc-win: set NODE_ENV=loc && set TEST=false && nodemon index.js
scripts.mocha-test-win: set NODE_ENV=test && set TEST=true && mocha --timeout 10000 && nodemon index.js
scripts.mocha-production-win: set NODE_ENV=production && set TEST=true && mocha --timeout 10000 && nodemon index.js
scripts.mocha-dev-win: set NODE_ENV=dev && set TEST=true && mocha --timeout 10000 && nodemon index.js
scripts.mocha-loc-win: set NODE_ENV=loc && set TEST=true && mocha --timeout 10000 && nodemon index.js
